name: El Valle de Abbatis (Game Demo)
description:
You play as Jefferson, a soldier left for dead amongst his deceased comrades. Thankfully you are saved by a scout party from a nearby outpost.

A short chapter in a larger project that is still ongoing. Set in a not to distant future on Mars.

This Game Demo is in Spanish only. It was created as a final project for one of my university classes and a full game is in the works. Game made by Bordachar Juan Manuel, Donoso Maria Sol, Farina Lucas (Me), and Gil Nogara Nicolás Martín.
